lead_paragraph: To the Editor: It is true that homeland defense could gain by requiring community service of young people (letter, Nov. 3). Older people should be added to this volunteer list.
abstract: Francis W Rodgers letter urges inclusion of older people in volunteer efforts against terrorism, as was done during World War II (S)
snippet: To the Editor:    It is true that homeland defense could gain by requiring community service of young people (letter, Nov. 3). Older people should be added to this volunteer list....
